definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: They have been secured with a pin place through the foot and ankle and epoxied in place.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经用针穿过足部和脚踝，然后用环氧胶固定了。

sentences.english: I rolled my ankle in a football practice.
sentences.chinese: 我练习美式足球的时候扭到脚踝了。

sentences.english: Lay your feet on the floor outside your left hip, with the left ankle resting in the right arch.
sentences.chinese: 把脚放你左臀部的地板外侧，左脚踝在右脚足弓处。

sentences.english: The ankle must be lacerated by some kind of plant.
sentences.chinese: 脚踝一定是被某种植物划破了。

sentences.english: My right ankle hurt where I had been lying on my foot.
sentences.chinese: 我的右脚踝受伤了，因为我压在了自己的脚上。

sentences.english: The edge of the hakama should be around or above your ankle.
sentences.chinese: 袴的边缘必须处于或高于脚踝水平。

sentences.english: I went for a scan on Sunday and it showed I have a little strain on my ankle.
sentences.chinese: 周日我做过扫描，图像表示我的脚踝还是有些问题。

sentences.english: Takeoff and landingDon't cross your legs or your ankles at takeoff or on landing.
sentences.chinese: 在起飞和着陆时不要交叉你的腿或脚踝。

sentences.english: Earlier studies found that running shoes could increase the risk for plantar fasciitis and ankle sprains.
sentences.chinese: 早期调查发现跑鞋会增加患上脚疣和脚踝扭伤的风险。

sentences.english: Eversion is when the ankle rolls outwards and this is what I did.
sentences.chinese: 足外翻是脚踝往外翻，而我就是这样。

sentences.english: Whipping of women in public for having non-covered ankles.
sentences.chinese: 女性罩袍没有遮到脚踝也要被鞭抽。

sentences.english: Next, try to hold your ankles and lift up your hips with your spine arched.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，脚踝固定，抬起臀部，脊柱拱起。

sentences.english: Vince Carter missed Friday’s practice with a sore ankle.
sentences.chinese: 文斯卡特由于脚踝伤势缺席周五的训练。

sentences.english: When lions climb, their ankles slide sideways under their body weight.
sentences.chinese: 在狮子攀爬时，它们的脚踝在体重作用下向侧面滑动。

definition: knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
